message: One of our interviewers recently called you about participating in a cigarette smoking test. We appreciate your interest which will help the manufacturer to develop better cigarettes for you to enjoy. Please read the attached instructions and then start smoking the first brand. Do not smoke any of your own brand during this test. After you have completed smoking both brands and answered the questions on the enclosed form, one of our interviewers will call. Please keep your completed form near the phone so that you may just read him/her the answers you have recorded. We appreciate your reading the instructions now and then as soon as possible.
